tool_description: Retrieves historical electricity demand, supply, and operational data from grid databases for specified time periods and geographic segments.

grid_segment_ids.description: List of grid segment identifiers to retrieve data for

start_date.description: Start date for historical data retrieval

end_date.description: End date for historical data retrieval

data_resolution.description: Time resolution: hourly, daily, or weekly

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and within available historical data range.
Invalid grid segments: One or more segment IDs not found in the grid database.
Unsupported resolution: Use hourly, daily, or weekly.
Data unavailable: Historical data not available for specified segments and time period.
usage: Provide grid_segment_ids array, start_date, and end_date. Optionally specify data_resolution. Returns time-series data for demand, supply, and operational metrics.

segments_data.description: Array of segment identifiers with retrieved data

timestamps.description: Array of timestamp strings in date-time format

data_quality_score.description: Overall data quality score from 0 to 100
